occupation: Vice President of Marketing & Sales at Heritage Community of Kalamazoo
headline: Vice President, Marketing & Sales
summary:
I am uniquely able to take on future-oriented challenges. I lead the way to visionary
possibilities and create what others said couldn’t be done. I’ll say "Yes" before I even know the
end of the question – then turn it into a productive adventure.

- Executive leader who is sought out for opinions, guidance, and direction in creating the vision and achieving the strategic goals of the entire organization.
- Lead facilitator of strategic planning in multiple disciplines that led to growth & increased revenue.
- 20 years of experience in leadership roles and 15 years of diverse sales experience that have a focus on empathetic relationship building and a results-oriented culture.
- 13 years experience developing marketing strategies that have led to achieving sales targets, new business line growth and financial prosperity in the non-profit sector.
Exceeded personal and team sales goals in each of my 13 years that resulted in >$45M in revenue.

experiences.title: Director of Sales & Marketing
experiences.description:
- Responsible for sales team that produces more than $7M in new annual revenue.
- Launched and integrated new data tracking software for entire organization to use from sales/marketing to finance and medical record keeping.
- Executive strategic planning of: new organizational opportunities, marketing strategies, fund development planning, HR recruitment tactics and new product/service lines.
- Analyze and evaluate effectiveness of sales funnels, costs and results – recommending appropriate actions and implementing adjustments.
- Conduct regular market research through trade associations, business relationships and competitive analysis.
- Develop annual marketing strategy for executive team and Board of Directors.
- Create/execute sales presentations to drive lead generation and initial stages of sales funnel. 
- Responsible for ideation, creation and implementation of new marketing initiatives including: website, design, social media, copywriting & public relations. 
- Supervision of marketing communication including: website, literature, packaging graphics, advertising, trade shows, and new product launches to promote the brand of Heritage Community.
- Oversee all external and internal marketing communications, including speech reviews, press releases & information for surveys to ensure consistent brand messaging. 
- Social media manager across major mediums; supervise team members in day-to-day content management.

experiences.title: Director of Sales
experiences.description:
- Smart Home Technology startup created by Heritage Community with national opportunity.
- Partner with organizations to not only build experiences that are smarter, healthier, and safer but that are also more effective giving them the platform and return on investment for years to come. 
- Responsible for advising CEO on marketing plan, go-to market strategy and leading the sales efforts to grow this new business line.
- Conduct on-site strategic planning sessions in person with diverse teams that include finance, operations, technology & executive team members.
- Prepare smart home technology strategic plan document complete with recommendations that include device list, integration, operational check list and go-to market recommendations.
- Facilitate regular check in phone calls and screen share presentations remotely to drive the sales process to success.

matt@experienceconnected.com
269-343-4375

experiences.title: Senior Coaching Consultant
experiences.description:
- Promoted from Direct Sales Agent to Senior Coaching Consultant within six months of hire based on high performance ranked against over 80 team members.
- Conduct sales using world class conversation skills to retain, build and strengthen current customer’s relationships with PNC.
- Responsible for new hire orientation, sales training, and team training. 
- Research and updating new sales techniques to convey not only to new hires, but as well as the entire team. 
- Present PowerPoint demonstration, bi-weekly, to the team in effort to increase knowledge and sales effectiveness.
- In the time since acquiring the Coaching Consultant position, the team paced for 200%+ sales to goal for each month.
- Balance sales and management time to effectively assist agents with questions, concerns and escalated calls while meeting and exceeding sales goals. 
- Member of several committees that include: United Way, Quality Assurance, Market Loan Manager’s meetings, Team Training and Team Event planning.

experiences.title: Account Executive
experiences.description:
- Take an aggressive, focused and professional approach to prospecting new clients with the use of cold calling. 
- Developed and maintained close relationships with the local business community in order to fulfill client’s needs more effectively. 
- Developed strong consultative and negotiation skills in addition to using proven strategic selling abilities. Be familiar will all packages, services, and applications in order to discuss and explain materials in depth to prospective clients. 
- Gather info from meetings to develop a marketing plan for each client to effectively use radio advertising and close the sale.
- Exceeded budget goals every month during employment and received weekly top sales award five times.

volunteer_work.title: Board Chair
volunteer_work.description: A board in which to advise the Village Council, Village staff and other agencies on matters affecting community development. In particular: developing a community plan, land use regulations, review subdivisions, review site plans, official Village map and special permits. Special consideration given to zoning ordinances as they relate to the Village of Vicksburg Master Plan for future planning purposes.

volunteer_work.title: Board Member
volunteer_work.description: The AMA Board of Directors is a group of volunteer leaders who are impactful visionaries in marketing. We provide insight and guidance as the AMA works to become the essential community for marketers.

volunteer_work.title: Board Member - Vice Chair
volunteer_work.description: Board member with the Village of Vicksburg Downtown Development Authority. Although I do not own or operate a business in the downtown area, I do value what that environment will be like over the next 10-20 years and I feel by lending my expertise in marketing to the business owners/operators that they can capitalize on opportunities of growth in the future.

volunteer_work.title: City Commissioner
volunteer_work.description: As an appointed commissioner, I found a passion I didn't know I had - civil service. The time I spent as a commissioner was truly one of my most proud moments in life to date. I felt a strong sense of civil duty to represent the constituents of Otsego with an unbiased opinion, to raise my hand with thoughtful questions and to challenge the status quo. I greatly appreciated my time spent there and had I not moved from the city limits, I would have gladly served for much longer.
